The Democrats need to change and prioritize working Americans or we will have this boomerang effect every 4 years, moving both parties to the right. That is not harm reduction, it’s jus harm.

talk.author: did:plc:wimjbrlg32dr5dmvhagaa4or
talk.utter: It doesn’t matter what I can or can’t see. You argue against reality, you argue against the results. It doesn’t matter how the candidates are personally different. If voters have two political parties that are starkly similar, they will vote for the party that promises change. Even if they lie.
